title: The Shelf Life of Beloved TV Shows and Breaking Down 'Succession' S2E8 | The Watch
description:
In just over a week, ‘El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie’ will extend the ‘Breaking Bad’ universe, so we revisit some of our favorite episodes and moments from the show (1:51). ‘Stranger Things’ is leaving Hawkins for Season 4 (6:14) and ‘It’s Always Sunny in Philadelphia’ feels like it could go on forever (14:23). Plus, breaking down ‘Succession’ S2E8, “Dundee” (21:42).

Host: Chris Ryan
Guests: Andrew Gruttadaro and Jason Concepcion

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
